snippet: Because of an editing error, an article Sunday incorrectly compared Supreme Court votes last week and last month on states' rights cases. A 7-to-2 opinion last month in a California case upholding Federal rights included three Justices who were in...
lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article Sunday incorrectly compared Supreme Court votes last week and last month on states' rights cases. A 7-to-2 opinion last month in a California case upholding Federal rights included three Justices who were in the majority of a 5-to-4 vote last week upholding states' rights.
abstract: Correction**June 27 article incorrectly compared Supreme Court votes on states' rights cases; 7-to-2 opinion last month in California case upholding Federal rights included three Justices who were in majority of 5-to-4 vote last week upholding states' rights
